data.title: Raphael Sbarge: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Raphael Sbarge? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Raphael Sbarge's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Raphael Sbarge News

Austin Jewish Film Festival Turns 21 & Reveals Full Slate of Films

The 21st Austin Jewish Film Festival presents a diverse lineup of films, parties, and Q&A events from November 2-12, 2023. Discover the latest Jewish films and enjoy premieres from around the world. Check out the festival's website for more information.

VIDEO: Netflix Shares New DAHMER - MONSTER Series Trailer

Between 1978 and 1991, Jeffrey Dahmer gruesomely took the lives of seventeen innocent victims. The series stars Evan Peters (Jeffrey Dahmer), Richard Jenkins (Lionel Dahmer), Molly Ringwald (Shari Dahmer), Michael Learned (Catherine Dahmer), and Niecy Nash (Glenda Cleveland). Watch the new video trailer for the series now!

Earth Focus Environmental Film Festival Kicks Off for Free This Today in L.A.

KCETLink Media Group, the national independent broadcast and digital media network, has announced that its two services, KCET public television in Los Angeles and independent satellite network Link TV nationwide, will launch the first film festival in Los Angeles dedicated entirely to environmental issues, called the EARTH FOCUS ENVIRONMENTAL FILM FESTIVAL.

Earth Focus Environmental Film Festival Kicks Off for Free This Saturday in L.A.

KCETLink Media Group, the national independent broadcast and digital media network, has announced that its two services, KCET public television in Los Angeles and independent satellite network Link TV nationwide, will launch the first film festival in Los Angeles dedicated entirely to environmental issues, called the EARTH FOCUS ENVIRONMENTAL FILM FESTIVAL.

VIDEO: Snow White & Prince Charming Sing Out in ONCE UPON A TIME's Musical Episode

The highly-anticipated musical episode of ONCE UPON A TIME entitled 'The Song in Your Heart,' will air on Sunday, May 7 (8:00-9:00 p.m. EDT) on The ABC Television Network. Watch Ginnifer Goodwin (Snow White) and Josh Dallas (Prince Charming) perform in a new clip below!

VIDEO: Mirror, Mirror! New Clip of the Evil Queen Singing in ONCE UPON A TIME's Musical Episode

The highly-anticipated musical episode of ONCE UPON A TIME entitled 'The Song in Your Heart,' will air on Sunday, May 7 (8:00-9:00 p.m. EDT) on The ABC Television Network. Watch Lana Parrilla sing as the Evil Queen in a new clip below!

VIDEO: First Look & Song List for ONCE UPON A TIME's Musical Episode!

ABC has shared a first look at the highly-anticipated musical episode of ONCE UPON A TIME titled 'The Song in Your Heart'. In the episode, one wish upon a star makes the entire enchanted forest burst into song.

Photo Flash: Blythe Danner and More Celebrate Closing Night of 'TIS THE SEASON TO BE MORBID at Pangea

Actor, director, playwright and teacher, Austin Pendleton, and singer, actor, playwright, Barbara Bleier, concluded the run of their holiday show, "'Tis the Season To Be Morbid" last evening at Pangea, and they were as hilarious and touching as ever.

BWW Interview: Drew Rausch On In-House Inspirations For His InHouse Theatre Company

A positive person with a healthy outlook on life, Drew Rausch has turned a major lemon into lemonade and, in the process, still manages time to help fight cancer! One of the founding members of InHouse Theatre Company, Drew took time from their now fifth production DINNER WITH FRIENDS to chat with BroadwayWorld and myself.

TNT Cancels Taye Diggs-Led Crime Drama MURDER IN THE FIRST

TNT has declined to order a fourth season of itscrime drama MURDER IN THE FIRST, starring Taye Diggs.

TNT's Monday Night Lineup Propels Network to Success

TNT's Monday night lineup – featuring the premieres of the ultra-popular Major Crimes and the critically acclaimed Murder in the First – propelled the network to success by nearly doubling their audiences from Live to Live + 3.

Photo Flash: French Stewart, Daisy Eagan, Frances Fisher and More at Pro-99 Rally in NoHo

Impassioned members of Actors' Equity Association in Los Angeles have raised funds from within their own ranks to follow up yesterday's North Hollywood rally with a full-page ad in Wednesday's Los Angeles Times to urge a 'No' vote on the upcoming AEA advisory referendum to eliminate L.A.'s 99-Seat Theater Plan. Scroll down for photos from the Pro-99 Rally, held yesterday, March 23!

CBS to Welcome 2015 with All New Episodes Beginning 1/2

CBS will ring in 2015 with all-new episodes of its hit series, beginning Friday, Jan. 2. The following is information on the first original episodes of the new year:

Photo Flash: ONCE Opens at the Pantages Theatre, Now Through 8/10

Pantages Theatre opened ONCE on July 17. The production runs through August 10, 2014. Scroll down to see the opening night photos!

Cheyenne Jackson to Host Lambda Legal's West Coast Liberty Awards Gala, Today

Cheyenne Jackson will lead Lambda Legal's West Coast Liberty Awards Red Carpet Fundraising Gala as the Liberty Awards Host, which celebrates those working towards Lambda Legal's vision of equality. Bravo TV's Million Dollar Listing star Madison Hildebrand will also join in the evening's celebrations as the Red Carpet Host. This year's honorees include Scandal's Dan Bucatinsky, The Fosters Executive Producers/Showrunners Bradley Bredeweg, Joanna Johnson and Peter Paige, Congressman Henry A. Waxman, and transgender advocate Bamby Salcedo. The West Coast Liberty Awards are today, June 13th, at the Beverly Wilshire Four Seasons in Beverly Hills.

Cheyenne Jackson to Host Lambda Legal's West Coast Liberty Awards Gala, 6/13

Cheyenne Jackson will lead Lambda Legal's West Coast Liberty Awards Red Carpet Fundraising Gala as the Liberty Awards Host, which celebrates those working towards Lambda Legal's vision of equality. Bravo TV's Million Dollar Listing star Madison Hildebrand will also join in the evening's celebrations as the Red Carpet Host. This year's honorees include Scandal's Dan Bucatinsky, The Fosters Executive Producers/Showrunners Bradley Bredeweg, Joanna Johnson and Peter Paige, Congressman Henry A. Waxman, and transgender advocate Bamby Salcedo. The West Coast Liberty Awards are on Friday, June 13th, at the Beverly Wilshire Four Seasons in Beverly Hills.

VIDEO: Sneak Peek - Rebecca Mader Guests as Zelena on ONCE UPON A TIME

On the next episode of ABC's ONCE UPON A TIME titled "The Tower", while Emma, David, Regina and Hook continue their search for the Wicked Witch

TNT to Roll Out 10 Original Series This Summer Including FALLING SKIES, LAST SHIP & More

TNT, home to more hit dramas than any other cable network, is preparing to roll out a stellar summer lineup of 10 original series

Sunny Mabrey Joins ABC's ONCE UPON A TIME as 'Glinda'

TVGuide reports that ABC's ONCE UPON A TIME has found its 'Glinda'. Sunny Mabrey (The Client List) will play the Good Witch opposite Rebecca Mader as the Wicked Witch of the West.
